name: Jorvik
tagline: UK/England feeds to HAPI FHIR JPA Server
body:
### Introduction
Jorvik is a collection of apps which have been built using open source tools to illustrate using HL7 FHIR in the UK (England and Scotland) Hospitals. Most are cut down versions of operational systems with the odd example which is for evaluation purposes.

### Patterns

Jorvik doesn't contain any examples of an open source Trust Integration Engine (TIE) (also known as Orchestration Engine [SDP:OrchestrationEngine(224)]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
